name: .NSCR File Extension
summary: Learn about .NSCR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Nintendo DS games such as Mario Kart DS; specifies how image tiles stored in an .NCGR file are arranged to makeup the title screen graphic for the game; stores location and rotation data for each tile.

content: Title screen graphics can be edited with MKDS Course Modifier and Crystal Tile 2.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
